items.sentence: Tom never thought he\'d be able to do what he just did.

Tom says he doesn\'t remember what happened that night.
Tom wanted Mary dead because she had murdered his kids.
Tom wanted to prove to his friends that he could do it.
Tom was a little surprised by how well Mary could swim.
Tom was about thirty years old when he moved to Boston.

You should always wash new clothes before wearing them.
Tom and Mary looked into each other\'s eyes and kissed.
Tom and Mary never should\'ve tried traveling together.
I\'ve been trying to spend a little more time with Tom.

Tom has been in love with Mary since the seventh grade.
Tom has been in the Boston office the last three years.

I\'m sorry things didn\'t work out between you and Tom.

Tom doesn\'t have to talk to me if he doesn\'t want to.
